It is a nice place. It was very cooling in the morning. Nearest parking at block 448B. You can feel the nature , the green, the birds , animals, .. a very relaxing place. The sunrise view is nice..
Nice and peaceful environment, can feel the sea breeze
A very cool place to get away from the world
